value.title: Q&A Visualization - Natural Language Generation Visualization in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will discuss about new rolled out feature by Microsoft during October 2019 update which is new Q&A visualization for the Power BI Desktop. value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can remove the users from the Power BI Workspace using Windows PowerShell.
